00017 class COREDLL Sampler {
00018 public:
00019         // Sampler Interface
00020         virtual ~Sampler();

00022                 int ystart, int yend,
00023                         int spp);
00024         virtual bool GetNextSample(Sample *sample) = 0;
00025         int TotalSamples() const {
00026                 return samplesPerPixel *
00027                         (xPixelEnd - xPixelStart) *
00028                         (yPixelEnd - yPixelStart);
00029         }
00030         virtual int RoundSize(int size) const = 0;
00031         // Sampler Public Data
00032         int xPixelStart, xPixelEnd, yPixelStart, yPixelEnd;
00033         int samplesPerPixel;
00034 };
00035 struct Sample {
00036         // Sample Public Methods
00037         Sample(SurfaceIntegrator *surf, VolumeIntegrator *vol,
00038                 const Scene *scene);
00039         u_int Add1D(u_int num) {
00040                 n1D.push_back(num);
00041                 return n1D.size()-1;
00042         }
00043         u_int Add2D(u_int num) {
00044                 n2D.push_back(num);
00045                 return n2D.size()-1;
00046         }
00047         ~Sample() {
00048                 if (oneD != NULL) {
00049                         FreeAligned(oneD[0]);
00050                         FreeAligned(oneD);
00051                 }
00052         }
00053         // Camera _Sample_ Data
00054         float imageX, imageY;
00055         float lensU, lensV;
00056         float time;
00057         // Integrator _Sample_ Data
00058         vector<u_int> n1D, n2D;
00059         float **oneD, **twoD;
00060 };

00070 inline double RadicalInverse(int n, int base) {
00071         double val = 0;
00072         double invBase = 1. / base, invBi = invBase;
00073         while (n > 0) {
00074                 // Compute next digit of radical inverse
00075                 int d_i = (n % base);
00076                 val += d_i * invBi;
00077                 n /= base;
00078                 invBi *= invBase;
00079         }
00080         return val;
00081 }
00082 inline double FoldedRadicalInverse(int n, int base) {
00083         double val = 0;
00084         double invBase = 1.f/base, invBi = invBase;
00085         int modOffset = 0;
00086         while (val + base * invBi != val) {
00087                 // Compute next digit of folded radical inverse
00088                 int digit = ((n+modOffset) % base);
00089                 val += digit * invBi;
00090                 n /= base;
00091                 invBi *= invBase;
00092                 ++modOffset;
00093         }
00094         return val;
00095 }

00118 // Sampling Inline Functions
00119 inline void Sample02(u_int n, u_int scramble[2],
00120                                   float sample[2]) {
00121         sample[0] = VanDerCorput(n, scramble[0]);
00122         sample[1] = Sobol2(n, scramble[1]);
00123 }
00124 inline float VanDerCorput(u_int n, u_int scramble) {
00125         n = (n << 16) | (n >> 16);
00126         n = ((n & 0x00ff00ff) << 8) | ((n & 0xff00ff00) >> 8);
00127         n = ((n & 0x0f0f0f0f) << 4) | ((n & 0xf0f0f0f0) >> 4);
00128         n = ((n & 0x33333333) << 2) | ((n & 0xcccccccc) >> 2);
00129         n = ((n & 0x55555555) << 1) | ((n & 0xaaaaaaaa) >> 1);
00130         n ^= scramble;
00131         return (float)n / (float)0x100000000LL;
00132 }
00133 inline float Sobol2(u_int n, u_int scramble) {
00134         for (u_int v = 1 << 31; n != 0; n >>= 1, v ^= v >> 1)
00135                 if (n & 0x1) scramble ^= v;
00136         return (float)scramble / (float)0x100000000LL;
00137 }
00138 inline float
00139 LarcherPillichshammer2(u_int n, u_int scramble) {
00140         for (u_int v = 1 << 31; n != 0; n >>= 1, v |= v >> 1)
00141                 if (n & 0x1) scramble ^= v;
00142         return (float)scramble / (float)0x100000000LL;
00143 }
00144 inline void LDShuffleScrambled1D(int nSamples,
00145                 int nPixel, float *samples) {
00146         u_int scramble = RandomUInt();
00147         for (int i = 0; i < nSamples * nPixel; ++i)
00148                 samples[i] = VanDerCorput(i, scramble);
00149         for (int i = 0; i < nPixel; ++i)
00150                 Shuffle(samples + i * nSamples, nSamples, 1);
00151         Shuffle(samples, nPixel, nSamples);
00152 }
00153 inline void LDShuffleScrambled2D(int nSamples,
00154                 int nPixel, float *samples) {
00155         u_int scramble[2] = { RandomUInt(), RandomUInt() };
00156         for (int i = 0; i < nSamples * nPixel; ++i)
00157                 Sample02(i, scramble, &samples[2*i]);
00158         for (int i = 0; i < nPixel; ++i)
00159                 Shuffle(samples + 2 * i * nSamples, nSamples, 2);
00160         Shuffle(samples, nPixel, 2 * nSamples);
00161 }
